attributes.action: ban the importation of palm oil products into the EU in order to help slow the destruction of Orang Utang habitat in Indonesia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So many of the the products we consume, from shampoo to margarine contain palm oil, but would you use it if you realised that because the farmers are cutting down the forests thousands or orang utans are dying each year?
